title: Over heating of backside and screen of phone
content: The screen was accidentally damaged, I repaired it in a shop , I replaced only screen not lcd .From that time onwards I have noticed that there was excessive heating of phone like before ,it was not heating that much . And when I tried to record a video outside with 80% brightness it should your phone is hot please shutdown . And I when I tried to record in home with flash on ,it started heating much . And flash turned off.
